claim: Notes on a Scandal has a reggae soundtrack.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The film is most famous for its reggae soundtrack that is said to have `` brought reggae to the world '' .

claim: Notes on a Scandal has a reggae soundtrack.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The film was shot in Jamaica and featured a reggae soundtrack performed by Lee `` Scratch '' Perry , Bob Marley & the Wailers , Steel Pulse , Dennis Brown , Aswad , Toots & The Maytals & Rico Rodriguez .

claim: Notes on a Scandal has a reggae soundtrack.
premise_source_doc_sentence: John Lennon can be seen and heard playing the introductory notes to `` Strawberry Fields Forever '' on a melodica in a hotel room in the film The Beatles : The First U.S. Visit which was filmed in February 1964 , two years before the song was properly written and three before it was released .

claim: Notes on a Scandal has a reggae soundtrack.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The original motion picture soundtrack also included work by Jimmy Cliff , Elvis Costello , and the Mighty Sparrow .

claim: Notes on a Scandal has a reggae soundtrack.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The band 's song `` Love People '' was included in the soundtrack to the 1986 film Club Paradise starring Robin Williams and Jimmy Cliff .
